name: Chocolate Fudge Sauce
preparation:
1. In a Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup, whisk sauce mix with whipping cream. 
  2. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-high and continue cooking for 3 min. Chill before serving.
tips:
Chocolate Icing: use a hand mixer to beat chilled fudge sauce to desired thickness.

Chocolate Syrup: replace whipping cream with 3⁄4 cup your choice of water, milk, or non-dairy alternative.
